This code is modified from the gl3w library (licensed in the public domain).  The file names have been modified to distinguish this version from the original. zThis modified version should also be considered under the public domain.

The original gl3w code can be found at: https://github.com/skaslev/gl3w
The post where this code was announced is at: http://www.opengl.org/discussion_boards/ubbthreads.php?ubb=showflat&Number=274873
